name: Cherry Butter Cake
description: This buttery, fruit-filled cake is like a buckle without the streusel topping.
recipeIngredient: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature
1 tablespoon lemon zest from about 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; set aside. In the bowl of a stand mixer, beat together butter and sugar until creamy, about 4 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating until just combined. Beat in lemon zest.
Add 1/2 dry ingredients to bowl and beat to combine. Beat in milk then remaining dry ingredients. Stir in cherries.
Pour batter into prepared pan and bake until a cake tester inserted into the middle of the cake comes out clean and top is golden, 30-40 minutes. Let cool 15 minutes before turning out of pan.
